fields.name: Construct Clock:
fields.value:
Attack a player. If they die and are
Town: Clock goes up an hour
Evil: Clock goes up two hours
Neutral: Clock goes down three hours

fields.name: Clock (Passive):
fields.value: The clock begins at 6 o'clock. Gain +.1 attack and defense power for the current hour. If the clock lands on three or lower, die. When the clock reaches 9, The next time you die, You don't. (You are informed of this) When the clock reaches 12, you win. (The game ends)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Activate win condition listing under the clock ability. Alternatively, Neutral Killing goal
